          <title>
            <string language="en">Penicillium and bacteria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Penezilin und Bakterium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Penicillium et bactéries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Penicillium e bactérias</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Penicillium e batteri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Penicillium και βακτηρίδια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Penicillium y bacterias</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows penicillium and bacteria in a Petri dish. This can be used as a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">penicillium</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">petri dish</string>

            <string language="en">growth of bacteria</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt Penezilin und Bakterium in 
einer Petrischale. Dieses kann als beschriftende Übung 
verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre le penicillium et les 
bactéries dans une boîte de Pétri. Ceci peut être utilisé 
comme exercice étiquetant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra o penicillium e as 
bactérias em um prato de petri. Isto pode ser usado como um 
exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra il penicillium ed i batteri 
in una capsula di Petri. Ciò può essere usata come 
esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει penicillium και 
βακτηρίδια σε ένα petri πιάτο. Αυτό μπορεί να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra penicillium y bacterias en 
un plato de petri. Esto se puede utilizar como ejercicio de 
etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
